title: 10/15/21 DPS Hour 2 Harold Reynolds
itunes:title: 10/15/21 DPS Hour 2 Harold Reynolds
description:
Harold Reynolds tells Dan that replay should be on everything. Harold says MLB needs a replay official at each stadium because you can't take 3 minutes for each replay situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
